meta_data.title: Every Single Bad Thing Was Checked on the Pink Ticket
meta_data.subtitle: Galatians 5:19-21 Thanks to everyone who supports TMBH at  You're the reason we can all do this together!  Music by

transcription_data.text: One time when I was in college, somebody got a ticket from our little cute guard shack from our now defunct college. We made fun of the guard shack a lot because they had to enforce these rules and we were college kids and of course we're going to be idiots. I don't think we're the worst idiots ever for college kids but there's some dumb stuff that happened at my college and the poor security shack guys they'd have to go around and issue these impotent little pink tickets where they had to write descriptions of the police crimes that we committed around campus and then they could give us fines of up to twenty dollars and they tick the box and be like that's a twenty dollar fine think about what you've done and there is one of these tickets that I remember that a buddy of mine got. He's also on the volleyball team he got a ticket where the whole thing was just full of writing his little pink slip and it described in detail all the things that he did and I wish I could remember it I wish I'd sell out a picture of it because it was the best ticket ever. They had the date and it had the police cop security guy who was writing the ticket on it and then there's boxes that you could tick on these tickets for all the bad things that are against all of the rule laws there at the college and every box was ticked like every violation as though my buddy had set out to see if he could break every single rule and then there's only like two or three lines to describe the offense but in this tiny tiny little minuscule handwriting each and every bad thing that happened story style was laid out. Offender rode on the hood of a car while his friends drove he was shirtless and wearing only underpants he was shouting the following words and they were like starred and bleeped out and stuff and it was just it was ridiculous. I don't know if all of that happened or not I don't think he should have done those things it's very bad but when you're in college wow we are you gonna laugh at a ticket like that that just has a litany of bad things on it however when you get older then you start to realize that things have consequences and stuff sticks to you a little bit you start to feel bad about more things that long list can manifest in your own brain as a mental pink slip ticket for yourself of all the stupid stuff you've ever done and right now in Galatians chapter 5 we are in the middle of a long list of all the stupid stuff or a lot of the stupid stuff that anybody can ever think of to do sadly this isn't even an exhaustive list of all of the things that we can dream up to do that are destructive and not the best but this list that we're looking at in Galatians 5 19 through 21 is it's not like a new 10 commandments thou shalt not do all of these things rather this passage treats it as though these things are just obviously bad the acts of the flesh the product of the flesh the fruit of the flesh of the sinful nature it's obvious that said even though this is a list that needs no introduction every time anybody says now someone who needs no introduction what do they do they give them an introduction so even though this is a list that needs no introduction even though this is a pink slip ticket with every box checked we're still going to go through every single one of the boxes the last couple days we spent talking about sexual immorality that's the first thing on the list the acts of this sinful nature are obvious sexual immorality and the next two after that impurity and debauchery are also part of this first block or this first clump of fruits of this sinful nature of the flesh that all have to do with sex stuff i mean the first one's kind of you know it's the big umbrella term sexual immorality and we talked about a lot of that stuff impurity here isn't talking about necessarily ritual impurity like we get in other parts of the bible contextual it looks like this is talking about sexual impurity being morally sloppy or corruptible and then debauchery is like i don't know sometimes there's a badge of honor in the age of instagram and internet culture like this is going to be debauched that's not actually good debauchery here in tones the idea of a complete abandonment of that which is dignified or good or decent or wholesome and completely giving in to animal impulses in a way that oftentimes is even public and unapologetic certain pagan festivals really lent themselves to this kind of stuff there's no mention of a festival here a pagan festival here so i don't know we get the impression from some ancient roman poetry and other sources that there wasn't always a need for a festival or an occasion to cause this over-the-top debauched kind of public behavior in certain segments of the roman empire so i mean it looks like again remember this list is supposed to be obvious it looks like what paul is saying here and it's like well i mean this is forward-facing flagrant over-the-top abandonment of all norms and decency and animal-like level remember guys i said it was obvious it's obvious for a lot of people i mean you hear this kind of thing and maybe your head goes right to what i was talking about the beginning of our conversation which is college i don't know what the heck happened but somehow this dignified idea of going to the university and studying hard to gain a career that will earn new dignity and respect and also a place in a brotherhood or sisterhood of fellow students moving forward to be the future leaders of america somehow that kind of devolved into run up a hundred and fifty thousand dollars in debt and make unbelievably bad and expensive decisions for four well it used to be four now five or six years i mean there is this whole idea that college is certainly for some people it's just this opportunity to completely indulge with no social consequences i don't think that's ideal obviously also when you're a kid and that's what's held out for you is this is just what you do during this time it's college rug there's going to be a lot of people who get out the other side of college and go what the heck did i just do during that period of time and it's entirely possible that when we talk about debauchery in a conversation like this that is thankfully anonymous there's going to be a a lot of you who go right to stuff that happened during a certain age of your life and you're like yeah debauchery isn't exactly the kind of thing i struggle with but dang if there wasn't a phase right there then it's possible that like the stuff we were talking about yesterday you drag that around with you and if that's the case well same thing as said yesterday all of this list the the acts of this infill nature the acts of the flesh is happening in the larger context of god redeeming at great expense the ugliest stuff from our worst day the stuff that when our mind trickles back to it and we think of it we feel shame and embarrassment and stupidity and to kick ourselves and can't believe we were ever there or that this screwed up thing or that screwed up thing ever affected our lives yet oh life is long you can't turn back time there's nothing you can do about it but god can do something about it this list once again is not meant to make you despair it's not meant to make me despair rather the primary purpose is for paul the spell out obviously this is the fruit of flesh stuff but a secondary purpose of this is if any of this again hits close to home it's meant to push us back to christ the grace and forgiveness of god which is real and which takes our absolute ugliest stuff ugliest status and flips it around to the status of son daughter child heir agent of the great king so sexual immorality impurity and debauchery those are the three boxes in section one of the pink slip here in the list of things obviously flow out of the flesh and they're tough they're gonna make a lot of us feel a whole bunch of things and paul's right it's tough list but it's an obvious list and also as we get down further into the list we're gonna see that there's more sex stuff coming up later on apparently the very same thing that eats our lunch in modern culture also was a real vulnerability and real problem for people in asia miner in the ancient world the next chunk of the list takes us in a very different direction though and we will get into the next part of the pink slip ticket with every single box checked next time around hey once again i want to say thank you to everybody who's jumped in here over the last week or so since i announced that we're moving quickly toward philemon and that we're going to be mailing out the Galatians achievement unlocked stickers soon a handful of you come along and supported the program thank you that is just ludicrously nice and encouraging in ways that are hard for me to properly express here but i'm just i'm very very thankful i'm very very thankful that we get to do this in general so y'all are awesome thank you if you are currently a supporter of the program it would be great if you could take a minute to go and make sure that your address is up to date as we're starting to fill out letters i mean we do this as a family so it's just you know it's just kind of us chipping away at it over here at the house but it it makes things i mean obviously we'd like you to get these stickers so if you can take a minute make sure your address is up to date and everything then we'll get it to the right place that would be awesome okay enough about all of that tomorrow we're going to talk about more fun things like idolatry and witchcraft yep all right i'm at this attempt at bible hour podcast let's do this again soon
